### **Welcome to the Dir creator assistant**
 *The assistant will guide you through all process to set up working directories necessaries for the Gap analysis.*
 ***
1. Write the Crop name in the Crop name field.
2. On the race name field please write only one name for the race, genetic structure or group to analyze (This app only can run one race per time).
3. Click the button **"choose Dir"** and search the destination folder in which the directory structure will be created.
4. Finally, click on **"Create dirs button"**, this will create all necessary folder to store inputs, results, etc...
5. You can also download the most updated scripts from the GitHub [CIAT repository](https://github.com/CIAT-DAPA/gap_analysis_landraces).
